org.coode.owlapi.rdfxml.parser
Interface ClassExpressionTranslator

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractClassExpressionTranslator, DataAllValuesFromTranslator, DataCardinalityTranslator, DataHasValueTranslator, DataMaxCardinalityTranslator, DataMaxQualifiedCardinalityTranslator, DataMinCardinalityTranslator, DataMinQualifiedCardinalityTranslator, DataQualifiedCardinalityTranslator, DataSomeValuesFromTranslator, NamedClassTranslator, ObjectAllValuesFromTranslator, ObjectCardinalityTranslator, ObjectComplementOfTranslator, ObjectHasSelfTranslator, ObjectHasValueTranslator, ObjectIntersectionOfTranslator, ObjectMaxCardinalityTranslator, ObjectMaxQualifiedCardinalityTranslator, ObjectMinCardinalityTranslator, ObjectMinQualifiedCardinalityTranslator, ObjectOneOfTranslator, ObjectQualifiedCardinalityTranslator, ObjectSomeValuesFromTranslator, ObjectUnionOfTranslator
public interface ClassExpressionTranslator

Author: Matthew Horridge
The University Of Manchester
Bio-Health Informatics Group
Date: 08-Dec-2006

Give a node in an RDF graph, which represents the main node of an OWL class expression, the ClassExpressionTranslator consumes the triples that represent the class expression, and translates the triples to the appropriate OWL API OWLClassExpression object.

Method Summary
 boolean matches(IRI mainNode, Mode mode)
           
 boolean matchesLax(IRI mainNode)
           
 boolean matchesStrict(IRI mainNode)
           
 OWLClassExpression translate(IRI mainNode)
          Translates the specified main node into an OWLClassExpression.
 

Method Detail

matches

boolean matches(IRI mainNode,
                Mode mode)

matchesStrict

boolean matchesStrict(IRI mainNode)

matchesLax

boolean matchesLax(IRI mainNode)

translate

OWLClassExpression translate(IRI mainNode)
Translates the specified main node into an OWLClassExpression. All triples used in the translation are consumed.

Parameters:
mainNode - The main node of the set of triples that represent the class expression.
Returns:
The class expression that represents the translation.
